title: How to copy text from anywhere on the web
content:
We’re in 2022, so grabbing text from a website or a document should be pretty easy, right? But that’s not always the case. There might be part of a site that doesn’t easily let you copy some text, or maybe the text you need to copy is part of an image. So we’re going to talk about a few tools to capture text easily. iPhone Live Text Apple recently rolled out the Live Text feature in iOS 15 that easily lets you copy text using your camera.
